articles.title: MasterChef Singapore Season 3 winner wows judges with winning dessert - Channel NewsAsia
articles.description: Johnathan Chew's lemongrass meringue tart garnered high scores from the judges in the MasterChef Singapore Season 3 finale, winning him the title and trophy by a narrow margin.
